sentences.en: For goodness sake, why didn't you ring me?
sentences.cn: 天哪，为什么你不给我打电话？

sentences.en: For goodness' sake, just use your common sense!
sentences.cn: 我的老天，你也凭常识想想！

sentences.en: Goodness, I wonder if he knows.
sentences.cn: 天哪，不知道他是否晓得。

sentences.en: have the goodness to look at me when I'm speaking to you!.
sentences.cn: 我在和你说话时能否请你看着我的眼睛！。

sentences.en: Have the goodness to show me the way, please.
He retains a faith in human goodness.
Keep your voice down, for goodness sake.
sentences.cn: 看在上天的份儿上，小点儿声。

sentences.en: My goodness, he's earned millions in his career.
sentences.cn: 我的天哪，他干那一行已挣了好几百万了。

sentences.en: My goodness, Tim, you have changed!
My goodness, you have spent a lot!
My goodness, you're soaked through. Where's your car?
sentences.cn: 天哪，你都成落汤鸡了。你的车呢？

sentences.en: She blathers about goodness and beauty and her own genius.
sentences.cn: 她胡吹什么德行、美貌和自己的天才.

sentences.en: She had an unshakeable faith in human goodness and natural honesty.
sentences.cn: 她坚信人的本性是善良诚实的。

sentences.en: She seemed to personify goodness and nobility.
sentences.cn: 她宛如善良和高贵的化身。

sentences.en: Thank goodness , we've found a cure for the disease.
Thank goodness it's cool in here.
sentences.cn: 谢天谢地，这里面挺凉快。

sentences.en: the desire to see goodness and justice in the world
the essential goodness of human nature
Would you have the goodness to turn off the radio?
sentences.cn: 劳驾,请你把收音机关上好不好?

phrases.tran_cn: (统计)（观测到的数据和理论值的）适合度，吻合度

phrases.phrase: have the goodness to do something
phrases.tran_cn: 请（做…）；有（做…）的好意（用来过于礼貌地表达请求）

trans.tran_en: said when you are surprised or sometimes angry
Goodness is the quality of being kind, helpful, and honest
